choose.when: insert into tbl_corporation_file (id, corporation_id, corporation_file_type) values (#{id}, #{corporationId},#{corporationFileType})
choose.otherwise: insert into tbl_corporation_file (id, corporation_id, corporation_file_type) values (#{id}, #{corporationId}, 'profile')

mapper.select: select c.id, c.corporation_file_type, c.corporation_id, f.id,f.file_size,f.file_path,f.file_name,f.updated_date,f.created_date from tbl_corporation_file c join tbl_file f on c.id = f.id where c.corporation_id = #{corporationId}
